page.title: 20Crane Moor 7
page.content: At the Gala in the recreation field each summer we have a Gala Queen and attendants who lead the parade up through the village into the recreation field where we are met by the opener. The opener has to crown the Queen and give them all a present. The Queen gives out the prizes to the competition and games winners and helps to draw the raffle. All the girls in the junior class have their names put in a bag at the May Day Pie Supper in school and the first name out is the Queen. They do the same in the infant class and two names are drawn out for the Queen's attendants.
